1.title: Game Start
1.plot: A recap episode highlighting the first 2 seasons as Class-1A and Class-1B prepare to start summer camp.

2.title: Wild, Wild Pussycats
2.plot: The kids arrive at camp, where they will be subjected to hard work like they've never experienced before.

3.title: Kota
3.plot: Midoriya finds out more about Kota and why he feels so strongly about heroes as a small but competent group of villains threaten to endanger the lives of everyone in the camp.

4.title: My Hero
4.plot: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

5.title: Drive It Home, Iron Fist!!!
5.plot: As the students and teachers retaliate against the villains, two students take it into their own hands to handle the unknown gas swirling across the forest.

6.title: Roaring Upheaval
6.plot: The students and teachers of U.A. are still fighting in the woods, but has the Vanguard Action Squad accomplished its mission already...?.

7.title: What a Twist!
7.plot: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

8.title: From Iida to Midoriya
8.plot: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

9.title: All for One
9.plot: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains' hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve.

10.title: Symbol of Peace
10.plot: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

11.title: One For All
11.plot: All Might's time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

12.title: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
12.plot: All Might has finally retired,and is counting on someone to take his place, but this is only the beginning.

13.title: Moving into Dorms
13.plot: The students of Class 1-A move into the dorms and have a competition to determine who has the best room as they settle in.

14.title: Create Those Ultimate Moves
14.plot: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves in order to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.

15.title: The Test
15.plot: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

16.title: Shiketsu High Lurking
16.plot: The provisional licensing exam has begun, and everyone's after Class 1-A. Can they last long enough to pass this first test?

17.title: Class 1-A
17.plot: Todoroki's on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu's group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

18.title: RUSH!
18.plot: It's down to the final minutes of the first test of the provisional licensing exam and almost half of Class A is still left...

19.title: Rescue Exercises
19.plot: The second test of the provisional licensing exam has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

20.title: Special Episode - Save the World with Love!
20.plot: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp.

21.title: What's the Big Idea?
21.plot: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

22.title: A Talk about Your Quirk
22.plot: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

23.title: Deku vs. Kacchan, Part 2
23.plot: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

24.title: A Season for Encounters
24.plot: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might's fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

25.title: Unrivaled
25.plot: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

1.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
1.plot: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

2.title: What It Takes to Be a Hero
2.plot: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

3.title: Roaring Muscles
3.plot: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

4.title: Start Line
4.plot: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

5.title: What I Can Do For Now
5.plot: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

6.title: Rage, You Damn Nerd
6.plot: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might...

7.title: Deku vs. Kacchan
7.plot: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

8.title: Bakugou's Starting Line
8.plot: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

9.title: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
9.plot: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

10.title: Encounter with the Unknown
10.plot: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

11.title: Game Over
11.plot: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

12.title: All Might
12.plot: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

13.title: Upon Each of Their Hearts
13.plot: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

0.title: Hero Notebook
0.plot: Izuku looks back at the events that brought him to U.A. High School and on his path to becoming a hero.

1.title: That's the Idea, Ochaco
1.plot: As the students and teachers recover from the attack on USJ, Izuku learns why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

2.title: Roaring Sports Festival
2.plot: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first years as they start their qualifying round-the obstacle course race.

3.title: In Their Own Quirky Ways
3.plot: The first years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

4.title: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
4.plot: Izuku's having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

5.title: Cavalry Battle Finale
5.plot: Fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle, does Team Midoriya have what it takes to stay in the top four?

6.title: The Boy Born with Everything
6.plot: Izuku learns more about Todoroki's past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

7.title: Victory or Defeat
7.plot: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but can he overcome Shinso's Quirk to advance to the next round?

8.title: Battle On, Challengers!
8.plot: It's one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to the second round?

9.title: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
9.plot: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he's up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

10.title: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
10.plot: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past and himself as they square off in the first match of the second round of the finals.

11.title: Fight on, Iida
11.plot: It's time to see who will make it to the final showdown. Will Iida's Reciproburst be enough to beat Todoroki?

12.title: Todoroki vs. Bakugo
12.plot: Todoroki and Bakugo, the two finalists begin their fight with one another.

13.title: Time to Pick Some Names
13.plot: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it's time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities-their hero name!

14.title: Bizarre! Gran Torino Appears
14.plot: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

15.title: Midoriya and Shigaraki
15.plot: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

16.title: Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
16.plot: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

17.title: Climax
17.plot: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

18.title: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
18.plot: Stain is finally captured, but now the hero community must deal with the consequences of their actions.

19.title: Everyone's Internships
19.plot: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

20.title: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
20.plot: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It's time to learn about One For All!

21.title: Gear Up for Final Exams
21.plot: Finals are coming up, and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

22.title: Yaoyorozu: Rising
22.plot: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

23.title: Stripping the Varnish
23.plot: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

24.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Origin
24.plot: Midoriya and Bakugo begin their match with All Might but the two of them have different plans.

25.title: Encounter
25.plot: The league of villains has two people wanting to join them. UA students go to the mall. When they're at the mall everyone goes off on their own leaving Midoriya by himself where he encounters Tomura Shigaraki.

-1.title: OVA: Rescue! Rescue Training!
-1.plot: Boku no Hero Academia: Sukue. Kyuujo Kunren. follows class 1-A as they attempt to finally complete their training. However, there's a masked figure roaming around the training center. Have the villains responsible for the previous incident returned to finish the job? If so, are the students ready to fight back?

imdb.plot outline: In a world populated with superhumans, the superhero-loving Izuku Midoriya is without power. However, after the Quirkless dreamer Izuku inherits the powers of the world's best superhero, All Might, his hopes of becoming the top hero are now possible. Once enrolled in the high school for heroes, U.A., Izuku soon discovers being a hero is much more complicated than it appears.
imdb.title: Boku no Hero Academia
plot: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.::ReptilePatrol

In a world populated with superhumans, the superhero-loving Izuku Midoriya is without power. However, after the Quirkless dreamer Izuku inherits the powers of the world's best superhero, All Might, his hopes of becoming the top hero are now possible. Once enrolled in the high school for heroes, U.A., Izuku soon discovers being a hero is much more complicated than it appears.::Stevo R
